data.name: Mastodon Cyberpunk Neon
data.description: Cyberpunk Neon color scheme is a cyberpunk/outrun color scheme based on the Cyberpunk Neon Color Palette. Want more of it? Check out https://github.com/Roboron3042/Cyberpunk-Neon If you like my work you can buy me a ko-fi or support me on liberapay.

data.name: Watch2Gether Cinema-Mode
data.description:
My first Design,
Cinema mode for Watch2Gether

For best experience set the room background to a dark color.

data.name: Dark Javadocs (Java 9-14 support)
data.description: Dark style for Javadocs/Java references, based on saidfgn's dark design, fixed to work with Java 9-14 too.

data.name: VUT compact
data.description:
Experimental compact style for new VUT design. Suitable for monitors with low DPI.
Not final version, there is a lot of pages which should be compacted as well... I am affraid this style will never be finished...

data.name: Logos Web App Dark Theme
data.description: Save your eyes some strain on the logos web app

data.name: MDN: Compat table: first and compact
data.description: Moves compatibility and specs tables to the top and makes them compact in articles at developer.mozilla.org.

data.name: Archives of Nethys 2E Simplified
data.description: Simplifies Archives of Nethys by removing excessive images and styles. Forces dark mode and uses muted tones. Focused on Pathfinder Second Edition and it might not work on the Starfinder or Pathfinder First Edition sections.

data.name: ResetEra Dark - Dark Gold Theme - HDR600
data.description: Dark & Gold theme for ResetEra - hdr600

data.name: mozilla.org Dark by BamaBraves (MDN)
Return WATCHED badge on Youtube (with custom text)
data.description:
Bring back the WATCHED overlay to the videos you have already watched on youtube.
In a recent update youtube removed the watched tag, and added a red progression bar on the bottom that doesn't function properly.
With this style you will get the WATCHED label back.

data.name: Dark Instagram by DM
data.description:
More Info: https://dark-by-dm9.webnode.it/
Thanks to jaaneh for the scrollbar included in this style.

Has support for mobile version in 4.0
Here's you can find the instructions: https://dark-by-dm9.webnode.it/tutorials/
